biotools.summary: Recognizes alternative splicing events in human and model organisms. Splice Detector employs transcript identifiers to proceed. It provides the frequency of active splice sites in pre-mRNA. This tool can be used to discover genomic coordinates of query transcript exons. It creates a graph showing the alternative splicing regions and gives an understanding of splice sites and alternative splicing events.

bioschemas.name: SpliceDetector
